scripts.build: node scripts/validate-build-env.mjs && GIT_COMMIT_SHA=${GIT_COMMIT_SHA:-$(git rev-parse --short=12 HEAD)} GIT_COMMIT_DIRTY=${GIT_COMMIT_DIRTY:-$(if git diff --quiet HEAD -- && [ -z "$(git ls-files --others --exclude-standard)" ]; then echo 0; else echo 1; fi)} astro build
scripts.preflight:publish: npm run seo:audit && npm run audit:a11y
scripts.preflight:publish:full: npm run build && npm run preflight:publish
